item.title: Germany - Three Days in Munich 20240823
item.description: Day 1 We took a Flixbus overnight from Eindhoven to Munich, a trip that took more than 10 hours. Besides being cheap, there aren’t many perks to this kind of journey—sleeping upright in a seat and not being able to stretch your legs is tough, and then having to start exploring right after arriving is even tougher. But, at least we saved two nights’ worth of accommodation costs, which is great because otherwise, I’d be broke.
